short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Google Ads with easy quote and bracket formatting for search terms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your Google Ads efficiency with the Google Ads Keyword Formatter. This easy-to-use extension allows you to add or remove quotes and brackets to your search terms directly from input fields.

Designed to simplify your keyword entry process, this tool ensures quick and correct formatting of your search terms. Whether you need to add quotes for phrase match keywords or brackets for exact match keywords, this extension makes the process seamless.

How to use it?

Click on the extension icon in your browser after installation.
Choose the action you want to perform - add quotes, add brackets, or remove them.
The extension will automatically apply the changes to the text in your active input fields.
Save time, reduce the chance of manual errors, and focus more on your Google Ads strategy with the Google Ads Keyword Formatter. Try it today!
